body.name: SPADE 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 1080P Full HD Dash Camera for Cars with 32GB SD Card, 170° Wide Angle, 3.16”IPS Screen, Night Vision, WDR, 24H Parking Mode Front and Back Dashcam
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 37 mins
features: UP-GRADE 3.16" FHD 1080P DASH CAM FRONT AND REAR- A built-in G-sensor locks the current video to preserve evidence when the car detects a jolt/crash. Even if the SD card is full, the dashcam will automatically overwrite the old (unlocked) video with the latest video. Achieve seamless loop recording, 3.16" super large IPS display screen can show the real-time image, help you see every details as clear as possible when playing back.

DASH CAMERA FOR CARS- Super IR Night Vision and Wide Angle, Featuring an F2.0 aperture and six-layer optical lens with HDR/WDR technology, the in-car camera helps reduce blind spots with four infrared (IR) lights, wide-angle front (170°) and rear (170°) cameras that clearly capture important details in low-light conditions and provide crisp video or picture quality.

THREE CHANNEL FRONT INSIDE REAR DASH CAM- The DC300P is a triple channel dash cam which offers 170° front camera, 140° inside camera and 170° rear camera, it can simultaneously monitor the front, rear, and interior of your vehicle while providing audio at 1080P +720P +720P, protecting you from potential accidents and liability issues.

DASHCAM WITH SUPER NIGHT VISION- The dash camera with WDR (wide dynamic range) technology, dashcam hd pro performs well in color precision and clarity whether day or night. 4 IR Light face to the cabin, accurately capture the driver and passengers even when the cabin is completely dark, ideal for rideshare drivers such as Uber, Lyft, and Taxi.

DASH CAM FRONT AND REAR- Dash Cam Comes with 32GB SD Card, The dashcam is equipped with a reliable and efficient 32GB SD memory card. You do not need to purchase this card. Simple plug and play operation, can record and play high-definition video. Format the SD card before recording.

HEAT RESISTANT WITH SUPER CAPACITOR- This camera is powered by a super capacitor built to survive extreme weather conditions from 14°F to 158°F, making it ideal for extreme hot-weather or cold-weather areas. The super capacitor also extends the lifespan of the batteries further than lithium-ion batteries.

DASH CAM- 24-hour parking mode, the dashcam will automatically switch to parking mode when you stop and turn off. It can record continuously for 24 hours in parking mode, and has time-delay recording function to record continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate, providing all-weather protection for your car. (Need a 3 channel hardwire kit ASIN: B0BLV768VD)

FULL LIFE TIME WARRANTY- Our greatest pursuit is to satisfy the needs of consumers. We offer lifetime 7*24 hour technical support. This is by far the most powerful guarantee on the market. If you have any queries, Email our customer sevice and we will answer any of your questions/concerns. We offer 7*24 hours technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 Channel Dash Cam Optimal Solution for Road Safety

Why Choose SPADE 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside ? SPADE dashcams for cars feature an ultra-compact and slim design, making it almost invisible on your car dashboard. With stable Type-c Port, turely plug & play. The sleek and discreet design ensures that the car dash cam won't interfere with your view or distract you while driving, maximize your safety.The car camera comes with 3.16 inch IPS Display, Super Night Vision, Motion Detection, 24H Parking Monitor and so on to get a 1080P real-time preview live stream, which is smoother and clearer than traditional 480P preview, can be conveniently download videos, change setting, edit and share footages with family and friends through various social platforms.DC300P dash cam for cars equippe with advanced starvis sensor and high transmittance glass lens (F/1.8 Aperture), capturing every detail of your drive in ultra-clear 1080*1080P QHD resolution, such as road signs and road conditions, capturing license plates from a distance.Using the latest real-time storage technology, faster storage, can avoid damage and loss of emergency locked video, DC300P camera for car will save the emergency footage to prevent it from being overwritten.The car dashboard cam also features seamless loop recording, allowing continuous recording even if the memory card reaches full capacity. When the storage limit is reached, new recordings will automatically overwrite oldest recordings.SPADE dash camera comes with a free 32GB SD card, which different from most dash cams on the market, you need to purchase an additional SD card yourself, so as to provide you with the convenience for your first usage. The dash cam also supports up to 256GB of memory, making it perfect for long journeys or extended periods of surveillance. We recommend using a well-known brand of class 10, U3 card speed micro sd card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and great video quality and great price.
reviews.reviewText: Great camera. Likes the fact that it was a 3 channel dash cam. I was expecting to be somewhat disappointed but I am going to order a couple more to install on other vehicles. Great customer service. I would recommend for anyone looking for a good cam without spending a fortune.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of setting up
reviews.reviewText: This is my second dash cam and I love the ease of putting this one up and using it. It has clear capture on video, and I have been very happy with its durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and works great
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and use. I love that it has all 3 cameras: front, rear and inside the vehicle. lInstallation was easy and done within a hour. Video had a good resolution. This is going to be a great product for added protection for me and my family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera but resolution could be better
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this camera for a bout a month and a half and it OK. Not great but it gets the job done for the most part. It has been reliable and easy to use. That said it has a flaw that keeps it from being a five star. It only shows license plates when you’re very close during the day. The one time I needed it at night it failed. I could see the car, and the driver roughly but not the plate.It however worked perfectly to prove in court that the city was operating an illegal photo radar and got a $279 dismissed. So it more than paid for itself.Overall for the price it’s a good camera just know if doesn’t quite get everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seemed great until I checked if the files were recorded - nope.
reviews.reviewText: Everything seemed great until a warning message popped up. First said to reformat SD card (card the came with device). I did that. Then it said to insert SD card (already was). SO then I checked to see if it had files from prior drive. NOPE. NO records of the recordings were found. And the playback features is nonexistent and apple laptop doesn't recognize the device. SO for a variety of reasons this unit is pointless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great versatility camera
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera for my wife cause she just got her driver license and beginner driver also gonna be blamed for their faults. So having this camera to record everything she's doing, going and her driving situation on the road. Just in case of collision we can see the recording. I think this is a great and wise choice. The camera is very stable, reliable and good resolutions. Like the sleek design. If friends want one in the future I'll recommend them to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and performs great
reviews.reviewText: I got this dashcam as it has backview recording which was nice. It's been around a month of using it and not an issue. The product feel to touch aren't top quality but the product itself works exactly as shown on the listing so really no issues there. It's held up surprisingly with the suction cup windshield mount so far. Other than all that, I can see this as a beginners dashcam if you're new to dashcams. It offers many features and protects yourself if someone hits you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not stick!!!
reviews.reviewText: The adhesive part did not have anything covering it when I took it out of the bag and it did not stick or have any glue on it at all. I had to ask for a replacement.
